block.p: OKIN-Jules. On July 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Minnie. Devoted father of Rona and husband Mort, Lewis and wife Roberta. Dear brother of Solomon. Cherished grandfather of David, Beth, Michelle, Brian, Alex and Rebecca. President of Green Art Plumbing Supply Co. of Baldwin of N Y. Services Sunday 12 noon at ''Gutterman's Inc.'' 175 Long Beach Rd, Rockville Centre, Long Island.
